document_data.name: Sheila Wyndlass
document_data.mainbody: '''Sheila Wyndlass''' was a priest who presided over a small chapel of [[Tempus]] in the village of [[Highcastle]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. She was known as a particularly zealous [[cleric]] of the ''Lord of Battles''. She was known to ride with the [[Pegasus Archery Company]] into battle.
